column1: le rona jwale ha resafuwa na
nna ha kesobone dijewa dile tala
ure hape hape ntho yaka etlaba ena
wena wafuwa ele ngwe le lieketseng
mm le mathopo aka etlaba ahao
tsa rona le neuoe etlaba tsena
nna le mabone ana etlaba a rona
le lebone leno lelecha hofeta leno
ualebona lee ka nqane ho tafole eapesuweng ka lelapi
ditlaba tsa rona tsena le mabokose ane
he wena tsebo tsamaya hobeha ntho ena
kaofela dintho tsena etlaba tsa rona
eya ke ratiyo ntho ena ha se ratiyo mokotla oo ha se ratiyo
moroa ee utlafuwa hona nna kefuwe sefe le wache
wena heno hona le berebere ya sepekere le heso
rona dijana tsena kaofela ebe tsa rona
tse habo moroa ditlaba tsa rona le boausi ntseliseng
tse tsa mokhorong etlaba tsa patriki
tse ka ntlong etlaba tsa rona
le nna ketlaletsa theipi ka mane
le nna ketlaletsa theipi ntho ena
nna haka hojewa dinamune ha mme mamello
ntho yane etlaba ya etswanang le ya tsebo
ae tsa lona ditlaba tsane tse ka ntlung ekholo
nkeletseng dipitsana tsee ditlatsitseng ka heno
nna ketlabapala ka kobo yane ya mme mamello
le dijana tsena le dipoleiti tsena le mankho ana le dichelete tsena
hei bo leoto laka lehaneletse ka
abuti mafa ketlamofa abuti mafa dibotlolo tsepedi
nna ketlaba moletsi jwale nna hakere
yane e pela ha mme mampho ka hodimo
helang kere moo abuti mohlolo asebetsang
nna ketseba moo mme mapitso asebetsang ele moo honang le moqomo lesakeng
mane moo honang le lejwe lenang le phofo
oitse hobaneng unkadime matla a sekhowa ao kenengkearata
jwale kebatla moriri ona otswanang le wa mme mamello
eng ke moriri otswanang otswanang le wa mme mamello
tsebo ha udule ka dibono ke eng
moroa ha hothwe wena hothwe tsebo
nna ebile koloi eno edulang ka tlung ekholo eampatla
nna he edulang ka heso eampatla
nna he edulang ka tlung ekholo eampatla
ketlare mme anthekele mahlo a sekhowa aetsang tjena
le dieta tsee mona tse tjena tse ekareng ke mahlo a sekhowa
ekaba mme mamello otlatsamaya neng jwale
kere ke ya abuti mojalefa papa ena
